greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors d of n such that A049820(d) > 0 and A049820(d) is also a divisor of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
formula: Sum_{d|n} [A049820(d) > 0 and A049820(d)|n], where [ ] is the Iverson bracket.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 05 2019
